Control.Text: $p achieved a new critical hit record! By casting $s on $t for $d damage!
Control.Name: TextBoxAnnounceFormat

Control.Text: Announcement format ( $p = Player, $s = Spell, $t = Target, $d = Damage )
Control.Name: AnnounceFormat

Control.Text: Display notification window on new record
Control.Name: Notification

Control.Text: Post to command channel on new record
Control.Name: Notification1
